amendment.description: Amendment sought to permit the closure of multimission small boat stations only if it is determined that closing a station will adversely affect maritime safety less than the elimination of Coast Guard administrative aircraft.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to permit the closure of Coast Guard multimission small boat stations only if it can be determined that the closing of a station would have less adverse impact upon maritime safety than the elimination of Coast Guard administrative aircraft currently authorized in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
